OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

JoinCommand.label: Command Name
JoinCommand.tooltip: The command to join the hunt

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

ActiveGameTime.label: Game time (seconds)
ActiveGameTime.tooltip: Game time to join the hunt (in seconds).

OnCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

Timeout.label: Timeout users who fail
Timeout.tooltip: If enabled viewers that tries to fish and fail will get timed out. Only available for Twitch

TL.label: Timeout length
TL.tooltip: Length for the timeout if users fail to fish

NotEnoughResponse.value: {0} you don't have enough {1} to attempt this! You will need atleast {2} {1}.
NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = currency name 
 {2} = amount of points

PermissionResponse.value: {0} -> only {1} ({2}) and higher can use this command
PermissionResponse.label: Permission denied response
PermissionResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = permission 
 {2} = permission info

ActiveGameResponse.value: {0} the hunt against {1} is currently active. Type {2} in the next {3} seconds to join the fight.
ActiveGameResponse.label: Active Game Response
ActiveGameResponse.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when a game is active. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = target 
 {2} = join command 
 {3} = time left

NoActiveGameResponse.value: {0} there is no hunt currently active. Type {1} to begin hunting.
NoActiveGameResponse.label: No Active Game Response
NoActiveGameResponse.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when no game is active. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = join command

MinAttendeesResponse.value: {0} not enough people joined the hunt, so it was aborted.
MinAttendeesResponse.label: Min Attendees Response
MinAttendeesResponse.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when there are not enough attendees 
 {0} = user

JoinedFightResponse.value: {0} you joined the hunt against {1}! Attendees: {2} - Win Chance {3} - Total Win Points {4} - Win Points per User {5}
JoinedFightResponse.label: Join Fight response
JoinedFightResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user joins the fight 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = target 
 {2} = attendees 
 {3} = win chance 
 {4} = total win points 
 {5} = win points per attendee

AlreadyJoinedFight.label: Already Joined Fight response
AlreadyJoinedFight.tooltip:
Message sent when user already joined the fight 
 {0} = user

B1Win.label: Win Points
B1Win.tooltip: Points that you gain for winning

B1Lose.label: Lose Points
B1Lose.tooltip: Points that you lose for losing

B1StartText.value: {0} du trittst gegen [Weiß] Feigeratte an. Win Chance {1} - Total Win Points {2} - Added Win Chance per Attendee {3} - Added Win Points per Attendee {4}! Viel Glück!
B1StartText.label: Start Text
B1StartText.tooltip:
Text that will be posted before the fight begins 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = win chance 
 {2} = total win points 
 {3} = added win chance per attendee 
 {4} = added win points per attendee

B1WinText.value: {0} und seine {1} Crewmitglieder haben insgesamt {2} {3} gewonnen! Somit hat jeder {4} {3} bekommen.
B1WinText.label: Win Text
B1WinText.tooltip:
Text that will be posted after you win 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = amount attendees 
 {2} = total win points 
 {3} = currency 
 {4} = win per attendee

B1LoseText.label: Lose Text
B1LoseText.tooltip:
Text that will be posted after you lose 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = amount of points 
 {2} = currency name
